translations.text: Perish the two hands of Abû Lahab (an uncle of the Prophet) and perish he!<sup foot_note=155070>1</sup>
His wealth and his children will not benefit him!
He will be burnt in a Fire of blazing flames!
And his wife, too, who carries wood (thorns of Sa‘dân which she used to put on the way of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم, or use to slander him).<sup foot_note=155071>1</sup>
In her neck is a twisted rope of Masad (palm fibre).<sup foot_note=155072>1</sup>
